description: The investment seeks investment results that exceed the price and yield performance of its benchmark, the Bloomberg Barclays U.S. Aggregate Bond Index. The Sub-Advisor selects a portfolio of fixed income (bond) exchange-traded funds ("Underlying ETFs") and other exchange-traded products, including, but not limited to, exchange-traded notes ("ETNs"), exchange-traded currency trusts, and exchange-traded commodity pools. The Advisor selects from among ETPs representing more than 20 distinct global bond classes, including, but not limited to, treasury bonds, municipal bonds, investment grade corporate bonds, high-yield U.S. corporate bonds.
name: AdvisorShares FolioBeyond Smart Core Bond ETF
